title: N. Korea Shows Off AI Suicide Drones
text:
North Korea’s Kim Jong Un inspected new AI-powered suicide drones and approved plans to boost production. Analysts say Russia likely helped develop the drones, deepening military ties between the two nations.

The drones, first revealed in 2024, are loitering munitions designed to crash into targets with built-in warheads. Kim also unveiled North Korea’s first airborne early-warning aircraft, which may also use Russian parts.

Drone expert James Patton Rogers warned: “North Korea is hinging very clearly on a drone future for its military.”

images.title: Blake, Wm. The Baffled Devils Fighting. 1826.
